DataElement.preferredName: Ped-PRO-CTCAE Past 7 Days Food and Drink Taste Different from Usual Score 3 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated response in the past 7 days about whether food or drink tasted different than usual, using a 3-point scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Ped-PRO-CTCAE Past Week Food and Drink Taste Different from Usual Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A measurement system that characterized the frequency, severity, interference,and presence/absence of symptomatic toxicities that include pain, fatigue, nausea, and cutaneous side effects such as rash and hand-foot syndrome, all toxicities that can be meaningfully reported from the patient prespective. The pediatric module permits self-reporting by children and adolescents ages 7-17 years.:The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about whether food or drink tastes or tasted different from usual._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A measurement system that characterized the frequency, severity, interference,and presence/absence of symptomatic toxicities that include pain, fatigue, nausea, and cutaneous side effects such as rash and hand-foot syndrome, all toxicities that can be meaningfully reported from the patient prespective. The pediatric module permits self-reporting by children and adolescents ages 7-17 years.

Concepts.definition: A measurement system that characterized the frequency, severity, interference, and presence/absence of symptomatic toxicities that include pain, fatigue, nausea, and cutaneous side effects such as rash and hand-foot syndrome, all toxicities that can be meaningfully reported from the patient perspective. The pediatric module permits self-reporting by children and adolescents ages 7-17 years.

Property.preferredName: Past Week Food and Drink Taste Different from Usual Score
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about whether food or drink tastes or tasted different from usual._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.longName: Food and Drink Taste Different from Usual
Concepts.definition: A question about whether food or drink tastes or tasted different from usual.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
